Dealing MagicDamage with abilities causes enemies to burn for {{Data.0.ADFM.col}} = [({{Data.0.AC1}}) + ({{Data.0.ACP1}})SpellPowerBonus + {{Data.0.ACP2}} target max HPMax] MagicDamage per second for 3 seconds.
After using the ability, the next attack is empowered with {{Data.0.ADFM.col}} = [({{Data.0.AC1}}) + ({{Data.0.ACP1}})SpellPowerBonus] Magical Damage (triggers once every 2 seconds).

When using healing or shielding abilities on your ally, they get charge which improves there attack by {{Data.0.ADFM.col}} = [({{Data.0.AC1}}) + ({{Data.0.ACP1}}) (Heal Power + Shield Power)] Magical Damage.

When using healing or shielding abilities you get 1 charge, after reaching 10 charges your next healing or shielding ability will gain [({{Data.0.AC1}}) + ({{Data.0.ACP1}}) (Heal Power + Shield Power)] and also affect you for {{Data.0.ACP2}}. After using ability all charges fades.

When dealing damage with abilities restore {{Events.0.Actions.0.Ability.Data.0.ADFH.col}} = [({{Events.0.Actions.0.Ability.Data.0.AC1}}) + ({{Events.0.Actions.0.Ability.Data.0.ACP1}}) damage dealt] as HPMax to the most wounded nearby ally.
Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing {{Data.0.ADFM.col}} = [({{Data.0.AC1}}) + ({{Data.0.ACP1}})HPbonus] MagicDamage per second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds.
After using the ability, the next attack is empowered with {{Data.0.ADFP.col}} = [({{Data.0.AC1}}) + ({{Data.0.ACP1}})AttackPowerBonus] PhysicalDamage (triggers once every 2.5 seconds).
When taking damage, restore ({{Events.0.Actions.0.Effect.GameUnitEffectBuff.Data.0.AC1}}) MPMax per second for 5 sec.
When struck by an Attack, deal {{Data.0.ADFP.col}} = [({{Data.0.AC1}})+ ({{Data.0.ACP1}}) Armor] PhysicalDamage to the attacker.

If you made damage more then 30% of your targets maximum health in 3 seconds or less, next 2 attacks will have ({{Levels.0.EffectCreator.Effect.Actions.Actions.0.Effect.GameUnitEffectBuff.Data.0.ACP1}}) Attack Speed.
